roleset.name: make believe, imitating, pretending
roleset.note: SIMULATE-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls establish-55.5-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from simulate.01-v)
SIMULATION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT, simulate.01. Corresponds to VNcls establish-55.5-1. (from simulation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: New York-based POP Radio provides, through a national, in-store network, a customized music, information and advertising service which-1 *trace*-1 simulates live radio.
example.arg: which -> a customized music, information and advertising service

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John simulated a VAX ministation with a cardboard box, three or four egg cartons, and a live beaver.
example.arg: with a cardboard box, three or four egg cartons, and a live beaver.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: In their simulation of high-speed packaging lines, one area that has provided efficiency improvements is the evaluation of control logic.
